title: Add protocol reference inventory and renumbering guidance
body:
## Summary
- replace the protocol reference mapping report with a data-backed inventory of handoffs, artifact directories, and supporting documentation links
- refresh the renumbering adjustment prompt with updated mapping tables, artifact translations, and validation tasks
- add machine-readable reference datasets plus validation and risk-assessment guides to govern the forthcoming renumbering effort

## Testing
- not run
